thread.title: Can Eagles defense make late-game stop? Billy Davis says yes
thread.title_full: Can Eagles defense make late-game stop? Billy Davis says yes

author: Mark Eckel | For NJ Advance Media
title: Can Eagles defense make late-game stop? Billy Davis says yes
text:
PHILADELPHIA â€” Eagles defensive coordinator Billy Davis watched Kirk Cousins take the Washington Redskins 90 yards for the game-winning touchdown both live and then again and again on tape. 
He says it won't happen again. 
"Over the next 12 games, I hope it comes down to the same situation,'' Davis said before Tuesday's practice. " We'll win the next 12 games .'' 
Davis chose to credit Cousins for making what he called a great pass on the winning touchdown to Pierre Garcon; and said he would make the same calls he made on the game-winning drive . 
"We had the right coverage,'' Davis said. "Walter (Thurmond) did a good job, if the throw is off he makes an interception. (Eric) Rowe did a good job, if the throw is off the other way, he makes an interception.
